entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of wet flurries this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
